name: Rigid Chess
description:
Rigid Chess is a futuristic, interplanetary themed novelty Chess Set that includes the following features:

  • 6 level AI Opponent Chess Engine, < 2 second (level 1) to approximately 40 second (level 6) response time per Chess Engine move.
  • Modes include Player Vs. Player, White or Black Vs. Engine, and even Engine Vs. Engine.
  • Full support for ALL FORMS of Timed Chess Matches with opposing Player Clocks and Move Countdown Timers.
  • Load / Save Game, 25 per Player Name.
  • Load / Create / Save Scenarios, 25 per Player Name.
  • No practical limit on # of Player Names.
  • Algebraic Notation moves panel (toggles on/off but still accumulates moves). Also supports exportable / modifiable / importable game strings.
  • Supports Castling, En Passant, and Under Promotion.
  • Full control of board lighting, black and/or white square opacity, piece color tinting matching themes.
  • 60 Fully controllable, rotatable, interplanetary themed background sky-box's including 4 plain colors, left or right, multi-speed rotation.
  • 2D and 3D custom chess piece set. 3D set has subtle animations running.
  • Suggest A Move, Revert A Move, fine and coarse Rotatable Board on demand.
  • Pieces display legal moves when first selected.
  • Rigid Chess remembers your settings each time you change them.
  • Three music tracks and various in game audio - all original.
  • All on screen objects can be toggled on/off collectively and individually, including the board via a slider - adds some challenge!
  • Extensive in game help screens.
  • Supports dual mouse play only (no controllers).

Buy your copy and teach your significant other how to play today!
